Giovanni Zenatello (22 February 1876  11 February 1949) was an Italian opera 
singer. Born in Verona, he enjoyed an international career as a dramatic tenor of 
the first rank. Otello became his most famous operatic role but he sang a wide 
repertoire. In 1904, he created the part of Pinkerton in Madama Butterfly. .... By
